title: AgentSession
description: Represents a session within an agent's operation, tracking its state, configuration, and associated metadata.

LastAccess.description: Last access to the agent session.

ThreadId.description: The current thread id for the agent session.

LlmConnector.description: The current llm connector name for the agent session.

Prompt.description: The current prompt name for the agent session.

Url.description: The URL for the agent session.

Language.description:
Specifies the language associated with the agent session:
en, pl, etc.

Description.description: A brief description or details regarding the agent session.

Variables.description: A collection of key-value pairs representing dynamic parameters or settings associated with the agent session.
